page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content:
RECREATION STANTON HARCOURT {CRICKET} There is an active village cricket team. They play on a ground just outside the village to the south, playing regularly in the summer months against other local teams. Players are chosen from the local area.
{FISHING} Many local people fish in the pits left after the gravel extraction. It is a very good area for most coarse fish.
There are two rivers the {Thames} and the {Windrush }which provide river fishing.
{LINCH HILL FISHERY} a stocked trout fishery run by Amey Roadstone Corporation (the gravel extractors). It is a day ticket water.
